channel.title: (Project Insanity Clean-Up) || RuneUnlimited
channel.description:
Refer to this topic below, for more information on the server. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,469278.msg3430867.html#msg3430867
We (Me and my partner Andrew) are looking for:
[ul][li]Server Coder (1)[/li] [li]HTML Coder (1)[/li] [li]Visual Basic Coder (1)[/li] [li]Python Coder (I cbf to do it myself) (1)[/li] [li]A good client coder (1)[/li][/ul]
Depending on how you can help us, will depend on the rank you will be given. You will recieve both an in-game rank aswell as a Forum rank.
[b][u]NOTE[/u][/b] I currently do not have a good date on when the server can/will be hosted, so PLEASE don't ask me.
[b][u]Application[/u][/b] [code]Name: Age: MSN: How long can you be online a day?: How long have you been coding [insert what your applying for here]?: Why should we pick you? (this doesn't have to be a paragraph, but please include some info): Please post 2 people who can vouch for you, via picture or quote: [/code]
Topic is open, you may now post; we will get back to you, TODAY via private message to keep the thread clean. Thank-you.
Here is a current list of the RuneUnlimited team<3 -John (me) founder, client and serve coder, head admin. -Andrew (real life friend) co-founder, server hard-coder, head admin when I'm not around. -Matt (Uncalled) pvp/pve coder, helped in re-writing combat. Big help, and big thanks. Administrator (if he ever plays serve or goes on forums) -Thomas (I VAIN I) Programmer, haven't yet discussed.

item.title: (Project Insanity Clean-Up) || RuneUnlimited
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:15, topic:373452”][quote author=Python_ link=topic=469467.msg3432443#msg3432443 date=1292461987]
Why write the file in Java, when you can write it and make it good in VB? The point is, for the server to be unique. It would be Assumed that those features would be written in Java, but it would be a surprise to run the program and see that in fact is was written in a different language.
[/quote]

It’ s pretty rare that someone will notice what a program is written in, especially the kids who play private servers. They just wanna play the game, not get into the complexity of the software used in the client.

Good luck with this though[/quote]

I don’t really mind if people who play the server realize what the program is written in. There are always those odds, that someone who can actually code a private server, and can recognize different program languages will join the server.

Read full topic

item.title: (Project Insanity Clean-Up) || RuneUnlimited
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Python_:

Why write the file in Java, when you can write it and make it good in VB? The point is, for the server to be unique. It would be Assumed that those features would be written in Java, but it would be a surprise to run the program and see that in fact is was written in a different language.

It’ s pretty rare that someone will notice what a program is written in, especially the kids who play private servers. They just wanna play the game, not get into the complexity of the software used in the client.

Good luck with this though

Read full topic

item.title: (Project Insanity Clean-Up) || RuneUnlimited
item.dc:creator: @Python1 Python_
item.description:
@Python1 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Python_ link=topic=469467.msg3432443#msg3432443 date=1292461987]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=469467.msg3432438#msg3432438 date=1292461727]

Few questions:

Why do you need a VB coder?

Also, I may like the Python spot, but only as a temporary thing. (Still busy with family matters, school, relationship drama, and my own server.)

Anyway, here you go:

Name: Thomas
Age: Fifteen
MSN: I.Vain.I@hotmail.com
How long can you be online a day?: Too long
How long have you been coding [insert what your applying for here]?: Too long
Why should we pick you? (this doesn't have to be a paragraph, but please include some info): I love Python, and I need to keep improving my Python knowledge
Please post 2 people who can vouch for you, via picture or quote: A lot of people. :P

I wanted a VB and a Python coder, because I wanted to put some programs that can be loaded through the client, and be used as tools. For example;

[ul][li]On-Screen Capture (Take a snapshot of the screen)[/li]
[li]On-Screen Recorded (Take a video clip of the screen)[/li]
[li]Music-Player[/li]
[li]Custom Notepad?[/li][/ul]

I needed something from Python, for basically the same reason as above.
[/quote]All can be done in Java.

So I don’t see any point in that.

Why write the file in Java, when you can write it and make it good in VB? The point is, for the server to be unique. It would be Assumed that those features would be written in Java, but it would be a surprise to run the program and see that in fact is was written in a different language.

The goal was basically to mix Java with other forms of programming. Some Python features, ad some VB features.
[/quote]If you’re only using it for tools, don’t use VB. Use something like C#, C++, Ruby, or something else.[/quote]

Thats where Python would step in. These programs would be coded via python, and built into client.

Read full topic

The goal was basically to mix Java with other forms of programming. Some Python features, ad some VB features.
